title: Supernatural's Misha Collins teases resurrections before series finale
text:
Supernatural is coming to an end but it seems we’re about to see a lot of familiar faces make one last return, if Misha Collins is anything to go by.

The actor, who plays angel Castiel in the series, is preparing to say his goodbyes to the cast and crew as the long-running cult favourite ends at the end of its 15th season.

In a video for the CW, Misha looked choked up as he admitted that ‘saying a lot of goodbyes’ was proving to be a struggle.

He said: ‘You asked me how the end is going, and you probably want to know about the show and the storyline, but I’ll just tell you that it’s sad, because it’s our last season and we’re saying a lot of goodbyes.’

But he then dropped a hint that we’re about to see some returning faces for one last hurrah – and it’s going to be a complete tearjerker as the final episodes play out.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘We always say “don’t worry, no one’s ever really dead in Supernatural”, and that’s always true, there’s always a way to resurrect someone,’ he said.

‘I think we’re going to have a lot of resurrections and a lot of goodbyes.

‘There’s going to be a lot of tears.’

What familiar faces will be popping up to say goodbye to the Winchesters one last time? (Picture: The CW)

Closing a 15 year chapter on the lives of the actors and characters, led by Jensen Ackles and Jared Padalecki as the leading Winchester brothers Sam and Dean, there are plenty of faces who could return.

One of the likely faces making a comeback is Jeffrey Dean Morgan, who plays the pair’s father, John, who celebrated his final days on the shoot by getting matching tattoos with his on-screen sons.

On the weekend in which he got married to Hilarie Burton after 10 years together, Jeffrey revealed that he got another permanent signature alongside Jensen and Jared.

He wrote: ‘Me and @hilarieburton weren’t the only ones joined for life…. @jaredpadalecki @jensenackles and myself will forever have a bond that is both special, and permanent. Love you both dearly.’

The series has a lot of old faces that could make a comeback (Picture: CW)

John was last seen in heaven with wife Mary, happy and content, saying one last goodbye to his sons before living in peace with her.

If you need us, we’ll be over here, sobbing uncontrollably.

Advertisement

Supernatural airs on the CW in the US and E4 in the UK.

description: Misha Collins, who plays Castiel in the soon-to-end cult favourite Supernatural, promises a lot of familiar faces before the series finale.
